attributes.action: Provide a safe haven to all Ukrainian refugees attempting to flee their country.
attributes.additional_details: Allowing Ukrainian refugees into the UK will ensure we uphold our moral duty and support to Ukraine. There is very little we can do to help support the Country but by opening our borders up to Ukrainian refugees would show a strong signal of solidarity to the People of Ukraine. We should follow suit of country's like Poland, Moldova and Ireland.
attributes.background: Ensure the UK is a safe haven for all Ukrainian refugees trying to flee their country. Issue visas to these refugees by making it easier for them to apply for, if necessary, a temporary visa. Lifting all visa restrictions necessary to allow them into the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
